game.name: Heavy Combat Zombies
game.description:
You have lost everything except your unmatched abilities on how to fight against enemies. So the objective of your life is only to find your enemies and destroy them. And the main problem is that the number of your enemies is very huge. Everyone around you in your city has suddenly transformed into your enemies. All the streets of your city are full of bad souls who do not want to see you alive at any cost. Join Heavy Combat Zombies game and get ready to fight for your survival in a way like never before!

This fighting is not going to be easy at all as you as a fighter have multiple missions to complete against the undead zombies. Keep killing your enemies like a pro, clear several levels and be the only survivor in this cool third-person shooter game! Do not forget to grab box with medical supplies and find some more advanced weapons to clear the place from a horde of zombies. Select from any of the two maps and begin playing this action 3D shooter online for free! It will be amazing to enjoy the adventure in the dark. 

Fight alone or allow yourself to face off a group of flesh-eating zombies on the basis of your choice! In each mission, you will have a unique task to take care of.  The look of blood-thirsty zombies will be scary and realistic as well as the graphics and gameplay are really awesome. Grab a weapon of your choice to kill all of the undeads and avoid of not being bitten by them otherwise you will also be turned into the monsters! Do you think that you can survive the heavy combat or you can say the destruction of zombies? Fight like a champion through all 30 levels in this one of the best html5 action games!!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Heavy Combat Zombies at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
